name: An aqueous mixture of peroxycitric acid (PCA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
citric acid
lactic acid
acetic acid
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
and optionally sulfuric acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxycitric acid (PCA) (CAS Reg. No. 127542-89-6), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), citric acid (CAS Reg. No. 77-92-9), lactic acid (CAS Reg. No. 50-21-5), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and optionally sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
